name: TRM Counseling Session Scheduler
author: Ebenezer Caurie
description: A comprehensive WordPress plugin for managing event-based booking for counseling sessions and webinars with member/non-member differentiation, donation integration, and multiple payment gateway support.
short_description: Event-based booking system for counseling sessions and webinars with Stripe, PayPal, and offline payment support.

sections.description: A comprehensive WordPress plugin for managing event-based booking for counseling sessions and webinars. Features include flexible booking rules, member/non-member differentiation, donation integration, and multiple payment gateways (Stripe, PayPal, Offline).
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to /wp-content/plugins/
2. Activate the plugin through 'Plugins' menu in WordPress
3. Go to TRM Counseling > Settings to configure payment gateways
4. Create events/webinars in TRM Counseling > Events/Webinars
5. Add [trm_booking_form] shortcode to your page
sections.faq:
Q: How do I add events?
A: Navigate to TRM Counseling > Events/Webinars and click Add New Event.

Q: What payment gateways are supported?
A: Stripe (Checkout redirect), PayPal, and Offline (Bank Transfer/Cash).

Q: Can I limit bookings per time slot?
A: Yes, set capacity and choose between single or multiple bookings per slot in event settings.

Q: How are member sessions different?
A: Members get the full event duration. Non-members get 15 minutes free or 30 minutes with donation.
sections.changelog:
= 1.0.0 =
* Initial release
* Event-based booking system
* Multiple payment gateways
* Admin dashboard with booking management
* Email notifications
* Automatic update checking
